name: Flip'n Seas
description:
Flip tiles to lead your ships to the treasure.

Controls

  • Click to flip tiles
  • R to restart the level
  • E to skip levels (glitches during transitions)

Mechanics

  • All ships move to the right by default
  • Tiles that are the same on both sides are not flipped
  • Nailed tiles cannot be flipped
  • Sea serpents act as mirrors (reflecting your ship's trajectory)
  • Compasses redirect the ship's trajectory towards the pointer
